Plot: Chaos breaks out in a small Maryland town after an ecological disaster occurs.
Title: The Bay
Writer: Michael Wallach (screenplay), Barry Levinson (story by), Michael Wallach (story by)
Actors: Nansi Aluka, Christopher Denham, Stephen Kunken, Frank Deal
tomatoConsensus: Barry Levinson's eco-horror flick cleverly utilizes familiar found-footage methods in service of a gruesome yet atmospheric chiller.
